practice_phrases: Instead of staying with the family
而不是和家庭留在一起
Instead of telling the truth myself
Instead of coming on their own
Instead of forgetting why we needed to stay
而不是忘记我们为什么需要留下
I'm afraid you'll give an excuse
Instead of them giving an excuse
I couldn't imagine myself giving an excuse
我无法想象自己找借口
Instead of telling the truth they give an excuse
而不是说实话他们找借口
You should instead of giving an excuse
They came instead of giving an excuse
他们来了而不是找借口
Tell the truth instead of giving an excuse
I hope you tell truth instead of giving an excuse
我希望你说实话而不是找借口
Stay here instead of giving an excuse
留在这里而不是找借口
You need to come yourself instead of giving an excuse
你需要自己来而不是找借口
I'm afraid they left instead of giving an excuse
我担心他们离开了而不是找借口
Let's agree to tell truth instead of giving an excuse
我们同意说实话而不是找借口
